scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --out-dir build --format cjs --minify --clean --splitting false --target es2017 && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.resolve('browser');const dest=path.resolve('build','browser');fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true,force:true});"
